languages.text: {n}Иокаста морщится.{/n} "Он всегда был самовлюбленным ублюдком и подхалимом, но Кредо чтил. Даже он не заслуживал стать одной из этих тварей".
{n}Sauerback grimaces.{/n} "He was always a self-important bastard and a sycophant, but he honoured the Creed. Even he did not deserve to become one of those creatures."
languages.original_text: {n}Иокаста морщится.{/n} "Он всегда был самовлюбленным ублюдком и подхалимом, но Кредо чтил. Даже он не заслуживал стать одной из этих тварей".

traits.speaker: MasterofDiscipline

languages.text: {n}Sauerback hace una mueca.{/n} «Siempre ha sido un cabrón engreído y un adulador, pero honraba el Credo. Ni siquiera él merecía convertirse en una de esas cosas».
languages.original_text: {n}Sauerback grimaces.{/n} "He was always a self-important bastard and a sycophant, but he honoured the Creed. Even he did not deserve to become one of those creatures."

traits.locale_text: {n}Sauerback hace una mueca.{/n} «Siempre ha sido un cabrón engreído y un adulador, pero honraba el Credo. Ni siquiera él merecía convertirse en una de esas cosas».
traits.speaker: MasterofDiscipline

languages.text: {n}ザウアーバックは苦笑する。{/n}「奴は、いつも自己中心的なろくでなしで、おべっか野郎でしたが、信条を重んじていました。奴だって、あんな生き物になるほどのことはしていません」
languages.original_text: {n}Sauerback grimaces.{/n} "He was always a self-important bastard and a sycophant, but he honoured the Creed. Even he did not deserve to become one of those creatures."

traits.locale_text: {n}ザウアーバックは苦笑する。{/n}「奴は、いつも自己中心的なろくでなしで、おべっか野郎でしたが、信条を重んじていました。奴だって、あんな生き物になるほどのことはしていません」
traits.speaker: MasterofDiscipline

languages.text: {n}苏尔贝克皱着眉头。{/n}“虽然他一直都是个狂妄自大的王八蛋，还是个马屁精，但他生前始终恪守帝国的信条。就算是他这种人，也不该沦为那些怪物中的一员。”
languages.original_text: {n}Sauerback grimaces.{/n} "He was always a self-important bastard and a sycophant, but he honoured the Creed. Even he did not deserve to become one of those creatures."

traits.locale_text: {n}苏尔贝克皱着眉头。{/n}“虽然他一直都是个狂妄自大的王八蛋，还是个马屁精，但他生前始终恪守帝国的信条。就算是他这种人，也不该沦为那些怪物中的一员。”
traits.speaker: MasterofDiscipline

languages.text: {n}Sauerback verzieht das Gesicht.{/n} "Er war schon immer ein aufgeblasener Mistkerl und ein Kriecher, doch er hat den Glauben geehrt. Selbst er hat es nicht verdient, zu einer solchen Kreatur zu werden."
languages.original_text: {n}Sauerback grimaces.{/n} "He was always a self-important bastard and a sycophant, but he honoured the Creed. Even he did not deserve to become one of those creatures."

traits.locale_text: {n}Sauerback verzieht das Gesicht.{/n} "Er war schon immer ein aufgeblasener Mistkerl und ein Kriecher, doch er hat den Glauben geehrt. Selbst er hat es nicht verdient, zu einer solchen Kreatur zu werden."
traits.speaker: MasterofDiscipline

languages.text: {n}Jocasta grimace.{/n} « Je l'ai toujours considéré comme un lèche-bottes complètement imbu de lui-même, mais il n'en respectait pas moins le Crédo. Même lui ne méritait pas de devenir l'une de ces créatures. »
languages.original_text: {n}Sauerback grimaces.{/n} "He was always a self-important bastard and a sycophant, but he honoured the Creed. Even he did not deserve to become one of those creatures."

traits.locale_text: {n}Jocasta grimace.{/n} « Je l'ai toujours considéré comme un lèche-bottes complètement imbu de lui-même, mais il n'en respectait pas moins le Crédo. Même lui ne méritait pas de devenir l'une de ces créatures. »
traits.speaker: MasterofDiscipline

languages.text: {n}Sauerback yüzünü buruşturuyor.{/n} "Her zaman kendini bir şey sanan bir şerefsizdi, parazitti ancak İtikat'a saygı duyardı. O bile bu yaratıklardan birine dönüşmeyi hak etmemişti."
languages.original_text: {n}Sauerback grimaces.{/n} "He was always a self-important bastard and a sycophant, but he honoured the Creed. Even he did not deserve to become one of those creatures."
